languages.text: "Я опасаюсь забирать выживших в свой экипаж, однако оставлю им помощь — грузы и поддержку для защиты от друкари".
"I will not risk taking the survivors into my crew. However, I will not leave them unaided — they will be given supplies and support for their defence against the Drukhari."
languages.original_text: "Я опасаюсь забирать выживших в свой экипаж, однако оставлю им помощь — грузы и поддержку для защиты от друкари".

traits.locale_text: "I will not risk taking the survivors into my crew. However, I will not leave them unaided — they will be given supplies and support for their defence against the Drukhari."
"I will not risk taking the survivors into my crew. However, I will not leave them unaided — they will be given supplies and support for their defence against the Drukhari."
"I will not risk taking the survivors into my crew. However, I will not leave them unaided — they will be given supplies and support for their defence against the Drukhari."
"I will not risk taking the survivors into my crew. However, I will not leave them unaided — they will be given supplies and support for their defence against the Drukhari."

languages.text: “我不打算冒险，不能让这些幸存者上我的船。不过，我也不会放任他们不管。我会为他们提供补给与援军，帮助他们抵抗黑暗灵族的侵略。”
languages.original_text: "I will not risk taking the survivors into my crew. However, I will not leave them unaided — they will be given supplies and support for their defence against the Drukhari."

traits.locale_text: “我不打算冒险，不能让这些幸存者上我的船。不过，我也不会放任他们不管。我会为他们提供补给与援军，帮助他们抵抗黑暗灵族的侵略。”

languages.text: «No me arriesgaré a añadir a los supervivientes a mi tripulación. No obstante, tampoco les abandonaré a su suerte: les proporcionaré suministros y apoyo para su defensa contra los Drukhari».
languages.original_text: "I will not risk taking the survivors into my crew. However, I will not leave them unaided — they will be given supplies and support for their defence against the Drukhari."

traits.locale_text: «No me arriesgaré a añadir a los supervivientes a mi tripulación. No obstante, tampoco les abandonaré a su suerte: les proporcionaré suministros y apoyo para su defensa contra los Drukhari».

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}は生存者たちをクルーに雇い入れるリスクを冒すつもりはない。だが、{mf|俺|私}は彼らを援助なしで放置するつもりもない。彼らには物資を与え、デュカーリに対する防衛のための支援を与えるつもりだ」
languages.original_text: "I will not risk taking the survivors into my crew. However, I will not leave them unaided — they will be given supplies and support for their defence against the Drukhari."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}は生存者たちをクルーに雇い入れるリスクを冒すつもりはない。だが、{mf|俺|私}は彼らを援助なしで放置するつもりもない。彼らには物資を与え、デュカーリに対する防衛のための支援を与えるつもりだ」

languages.text: « Je ne prendrai pas le risque d'accueillir les survivants au sein de mon équipage, mais je ne compte pas non plus les abandonner à leur sort. Nous leur donnerons des provisions et du matériel qui les aideront à résister aux Drukharis. »
languages.original_text: "I will not risk taking the survivors into my crew. However, I will not leave them unaided — they will be given supplies and support for their defence against the Drukhari."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne prendrai pas le risque d'accueillir les survivants au sein de mon équipage, mais je ne compte pas non plus les abandonner à leur sort. Nous leur donnerons des provisions et du matériel qui les aideront à résister aux Drukharis. »

languages.text: "Ich werde nicht riskieren, die Überlebenden in meine Crew aufzunehmen. Ich lasse sie aber auch nicht ohne Hilfe zurück – sie erhalten Vorräte und Unterstützung für ihre Verteidigung gegen die Drukhari."
languages.original_text: "I will not risk taking the survivors into my crew. However, I will not leave them unaided — they will be given supplies and support for their defence against the Drukhari."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde nicht riskieren, die Überlebenden in meine Crew aufzunehmen. Ich lasse sie aber auch nicht ohne Hilfe zurück – sie erhalten Vorräte und Unterstützung für ihre Verteidigung gegen die Drukhari."

languages.text: "Sağ kalanları mürettebatıma katma riskini almayacağım. Tabii onları biçare hâlde de bırakmayacağım. Erzak verilecek ve Drukharilere direnebilmeleri için yardım sunulacak."
languages.original_text: "I will not risk taking the survivors into my crew. However, I will not leave them unaided — they will be given supplies and support for their defence against the Drukhari."

traits.locale_text: "Hayatta kalanları mürettebatıma katma riskini almayacağım ancak onları biçare hâlde de bırakmayacağım. Erzak desteği ve Drukhari karşısındaki direnişleri için yardım alacaklar."
